thread.title: Nice branded place few meters from the train station
thread.title_full: Nice branded place few meters from the train station - Review of Holiday Inn Paris Gare de Lyon Bastille, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: George K
title: Nice branded place few meters from the train station
text:
An excellent hotel where you can spend a night near the Gare de Lyon. The location is very convenient as it is 2 minutes walk from the station. You can use it as a base in Paris or as a stop over. The 5th floor has been renovated and the rooms and bathrooms there are nice and comfortable.
Finally , it is not cheap but for Paris it is a good price !!
I may come back !!
